page.title: 01DAILY LIFE IN FALMER/COLDEAN
page.content: Get up at 6.30 a.m.Have a wash and get dressed.Next we eat our breakfast,it is now about 7.45 a.m.I leave my house at 8.10 a.m,which gives me plenty of time to get to Falmer School from the Coldean estate.On the way,I go to the Coldean sweet shop and buy some sweets for my packed-lunch.Next I walk up to school.Our school day starts at 8.40 a.m.We have registration,then we have four lessons.After the four lessons,we have a twenty-minute break,and then we have two more lessons before dinner.Dinner lasts for forty-five minutes,and then we have tmo more lessons before 3.05 p.m,which is home time.We come home and do our homework. We then get changed out of uniform,and then go out to discos,night clubs,or youth clubs. By Sarah Taylor.
